topicSummary: Approximately 50,000 new cases of breast cancer are diagnosed each year in the UK, around a quarter of which through screening mammography.

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Breast cancer - recognition and referral: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: The National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) quality standards for suspected cancer have been added to this topic.

latestChanges.title: Revised
latestChanges.body: This topic is a direct implementation of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence guideline Suspected cancer: recognition and referral NICE, 2015. This CKS topic replaces the former topic on Breast cancer - suspected.
